definition: incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb

sentences.english: Whoso curseth his father or his mother, his lamp shall be put out in obscure darkness.
sentences.chinese: 咒骂父母的，他的灯必灭，变为漆黑的黑暗。

sentences.english: ''Our research shows one potential reason why swearing developed and why it persists.
sentences.chinese: 我们的研究给出了咒骂存在并发展的一个潜在原因。

sentences.english: But he never curse in his music.
sentences.chinese: 但是在音乐中，张楚从不咒骂。

sentences.english: Damn this man, he teases me.
He requited my kindness with cruel words.
sentences.chinese: 他竟以咒骂来回报我的善待。

sentences.english: Forever more, I will be the jailor of the Damned.
sentences.chinese: 从今以还，我将羁系这咒骂之力。

sentences.english: He execrated all who opposed him.
sentences.chinese: 他咒骂所有反对他的人。

sentences.english: Kearney cursed and threw down his radio.
sentences.chinese: 科尼尔咒骂着扔下无线收音机。

sentences.english: The epithet Gingrich hurled at us was correct in some respects.
sentences.chinese: 金里奇咒骂我们的称呼，在某些方面来说，是正确的。

sentences.english: Many students now anathematise "Bologna" as a capitalist plot.
sentences.chinese: 如今许多学生咒骂“博洛尼亚”是资本家的阴谋。

sentences.english: He requited my kindness only with cruel words.
sentences.chinese: 他竟以咒骂来回报我的善待。

sentences.english: Would you turn their distress into a malediction?
sentences.chinese: 你要借他们的苦难来咒骂他们吗？

sentences.english: I only could curse on devil of excuse our hearts with peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 我只能咒骂，咒骂扰乱我们宁静心田的怪兽与狰狞。

sentences.english: I only could curse on devil of excuse our hearts with peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 我只能咒骂，咒骂扰乱我们宁静心田的怪兽与狰狞。

sentences.english: His speech is full of " damns".
He entered vociferating oaths dreadful to her .
sentences.chinese: 他进来了，叫喊着不堪入耳的咒骂的话。

definition: to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
gnashing one's teeth (idiom); displaying extreme anger/fuming with rage between gritted teeth
